column2: an A.M. Eatery////OVERALL: It's a chain restaurant
column3: and I am typically not big on chains. However; the food was good and I can understand why it's so popular. However
column4: I do not think it's worth a 2 hour wait. For the 15-20 minutes that we waited
column5: that was completely fine. But with living in Houston
column6: and having sooooooo many delicious breakfast options to choose from
column7: that won't take half of the day to complete
column8: you will probably catch me elsewhere for breakfast. I don't think the pancakes are enough to make me return...
